content.text:
# 2002 Prince Edward Island Scott Tournament of Hearts

The 2002 Prince Edward Island Scott Tournament of Hearts was held February 1â€“5  at the Silver Fox Curling Club in Summerside, Prince Edward Island. The winning team was Team Kathy O'Rourke who represented Prince Edward Island, finished with a 3-8 round-robin record at the 2002 Scott Tournament of Hearts in Brandon, Manitoba.
